data.text: Da no, Debora ne Abinoam babarima Barak too saa dwom yi:
“Israel mpanyimfo sɔre dii anim,
“Mo ahemfo, muntie!
“Awurade, bere a wufii Seir,
Awurade ba no maa mmepɔw wosowee.
“Anat ba Samgar ne Yael bere so,
Nnipa kakra na wɔkaa Israel nkuraa
Bere a Israel som anyame foforo no,
Mewɔ Israel ntuanofo afa
“Mo a motete afurum a wɔte apɔw so,
Muntie nkuraa nnwontofo a wɔaboa wɔn ho ano wɔ anomee.
‘Sɔre! Debora, sɔre!
“Nkaefo no bɔɔ nsra fi Tabor kɔɔ ahoɔdenfo so.
Wofi Efraim bae, asase a na kan no na ɛyɛ Amalekfo dea,
Na Isakar mu atitiriw ka Debora ne Barak ho.
Adɛn nti na wotenaa fie wɔ nguanhwɛfo mu,
Gilead kaa Yordan apuei hɔ.
Nanso Sebulon too ne nkwa apemafo
“Kanaan ahemfo koo wɔ Taanak a ɛbɛn Megido asu ho,
Nsoromma fi soro koe.
Asubɔnten Kison twee wɔn kɔe,
Afei, apɔnkɔ no tɔte pempem fam,
‘Nnome nka Merosfo,’ Awurade bɔfo na ose.
“Nhyira nka Yael,
Sisera srɛɛ nsu,
Afei, ɔde ne nsa benkum yii ntamadan pɛe,
Ɔmemee, ɔhwee ase;
“Sisera nena hwɛɛ mfɛnsere mu;
Ne mmea anyansafo no rema mmuae no,
‘Wɔrekyɛ asade a wonyae no,
“Awurade, ma wʼatamfo nyinaa nwu sɛ Sisera!
